# /fix An import path can only end with a '.tsx' extension when 'allowImportingTsExtensions' is enabled. (2025-11-09 20:35Z)

_**User (2025-11-09 20:35Z)**_

/fix An import path can only end with a '.tsx' extension when 'allowImportingTsExtensions' is enabled.

---

_**Agent (model copilot/claude-sonnet-4)**_

I'll fix the TypeScript import error by removing the `.tsx` extension from the import statement, which is the standard practice in TypeScript React projects.
